description: Create a project phase cost item
permissions: Allowed for admins, or for users who can update the related project phase revenue item, or who are a manager on the related job production plan's customer, a manager laborer, a laborer who can manage projects, or the job production plan planner/project manager.
side_effects: Creates a project phase cost item and related relationships.
validation_notes: --project-phase-revenue-item and --project-cost-classification are required. is-revenue-quantity-driver accepts true or false. project-cost-classification is unique per project-phase-revenue-item. project-resource-classification must share the same broker as the project. cost-code must belong to the project cost codes or be related to a project customer.

flags.name: --is-revenue-quantity-driver
flags.description: Whether this item drives revenue quantity (true/false)
